title: How to Make Grilled Jerk Chicken

steps.headline: Combine all ingredients except chicken in a blender or food processor.
Place (about 8 pieces) of chicken in a ziplock bag.
Pour 1/2 of mixture into bag and massage chicken.
Refrigerate marinated chicken for 4 to 6 hours.
Spray the grilling rack with Pam first to reduce sticking.
Place chicken on pimento wood over grill, put the coals to the opposite  side.

text: Combine all ingredients except chicken in a blender or food processor.  Blend into a paste.  Place (about 8 pieces) of chicken in a ziplock bag.  Pour 1/2 of mixture into bag and massage chicken.  Refrigerate marinated chicken for 4 to 6 hours.  Turning the bag occasionally.  Prepare your grill.  Spray the grilling rack with Pam first to reduce sticking.  Place chicken on pimento wood over grill, put the coals to the opposite  side.  Cover and let cook.  Finished.
